attributes.action: Openly condemn the terrorist actions of the Zionists attacking Palestinian children and innocents. Making specific reference to the funding of these murderers by the Obama government .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the ongoing destruction of a peaceful race who has been evicted from their homeland, murder and suffering are used as weapons to further the illegitimate cause of the Zionists. We petition the government to speak out against this injustice and condemn American funding of this bloodbath.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
